paragraphs.body: Jordan worked as a professional performer for over sixty years. By age sixteen, he had performed in Grand Opera and hosted his own radio show; he would later acquire roles in many Broadway shows, including Funny Girl, Kiss Me Kate, Guys and Dolls, and Titanic. He has also landed roles in a number of television shows, including Night Court and Days of Our Lives, as well as in animated programs such as The Real Adventures of Jonny Quest.
paragraphs.text: Jordan worked as a professional performer for over sixty years. By age sixteen, he had performed in Grand Opera and hosted his own radio show; he would later acquire roles in many Broadway shows, including Funny Girl, Kiss Me Kate, Guys and Dolls, and Titanic. He has also landed roles in a number of television shows, including Night Court and Days of Our Lives, as well as in animated programs such as The Real Adventures of Jonny Quest.

paragraphs.body: Jordan joined the Actors' Equity Association in 1957 and was a member of the National Council and Western Regional Board for 36 years, serving on more than sixty committees in his lifetime.
paragraphs.text: Jordan joined the Actors' Equity Association in 1957 and was a member of the National Council and Western Regional Board for 36 years, serving on more than sixty committees in his lifetime.
